cards.name: Avenger of Zendikar
cards.text:
When Avenger of Zendikar enters the battlefield, put a 0/1 green Plant creature token onto the battlefield for each land you control.
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on each Plant creature you control.

cards.flavor: Once a welcoming hub for explorers, Affa became a place of guarded tongues and quick defenses.
cards.name: Affa Guard Hound
cards.text:
Flash
When Affa Guard Hound enters the battlefield, target creature gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

cards.name: Caravan Escort
cards.text:
Level up {2} ({2}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-4
2/2
LEVEL 5+
5/5
First strike

cards.name: Kabira Vindicator
cards.text:
Level up {2}{W} ({2}{W}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 2-4
3/6
Other creatures you control get +1/+1.
LEVEL 5+
4/8
Other creatures you control get +2/+2.

cards.name: Knight of Cliffhaven
cards.text:
Level up {3} ({3}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-3
2/3
Flying
LEVEL 4+
4/4
Flying, vigilance

cards.flavor: As the hedrons began to coalesce into colossal Eldrazi superstructures, the griffins were forced to seek new territory lest their aeries be crushed between the massive stone monoliths.
cards.name: Makindi Griffin
cards.text: Flying

cards.flavor:
"‘Invincible' is just a word."
—Gideon Jura
cards.name: Oust
cards.text: Put target creature into its owner's library second from the top. Its controller gains 3 life.

cards.flavor: A boon to those who cannot see in the dark. A bane to those who live in it.
cards.name: Repel the Darkness
cards.text:
Tap up to two target creatures.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Sheer Drop
cards.text:
Destroy target tapped creature.
Awaken 3—{5}{W} (If you cast this spell for {5}{W}, also put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

cards.name: Beastbreaker of Bala Ged
cards.text:
Level up {2}{G} ({2}{G}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-3
4/4
LEVEL 4+
6/6
Trample

cards.flavor:
"Petrifying gaze, deadly fangs, knifelike dorsal spines, venomous saliva . . . Am I missing anything? . . . Toxic bones? Seriously?"
—Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House
cards.name: Daggerback Basilisk
cards.text: Deathtouch

cards.flavor: "The elders say Zendikar has no safe, peaceful places. How would they know? They've never looked."
cards.name: Frontier Guide
cards.text: {3}{G}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: He'll cleave wood and bone alike to carve a path for his allies.
cards.name: Graypelt Hunter
cards.text:
Trample
Whenever Graypelt Hunter or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Graypelt Hunter.

cards.flavor:
"Don't be fooled. If it were as docile as it looks, it would've died off long ago."
—Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist
cards.name: Grazing Gladehart
cards.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain 2 life.

cards.flavor: "This world will not be tamed."
cards.name: Groundswell
cards.text:
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Landfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead.

cards.flavor: The Roil redraws the world as it passes, leaving only the hedrons unchanged.
cards.name: Harrow
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Harrow, sacrifice a land.
Search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: Adventuring bards recite Chanter's Epics, never-ending tales that keep their comrades' minds alert to danger.
cards.name: Joraga Bard
cards.text: Whenever Joraga Bard or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Ally creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.

cards.name: Khalni Heart Expedition
cards.text:
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Khalni Heart Expedition.
Remove three quest counters from Khalni Heart Expedition and sacrifice it: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

cards.flavor: Some druids nurture gardens. Others nurture continents.
cards.name: Ondu Giant
cards.text: When Ondu Giant enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Primal Command
cards.text:
Choose two —
• Target player gains 7 life.
• Put target noncreature permanent on top of its owner's library.
• Target player shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.
• Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Retreat to Kazandu
cards.text:
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
• You gain 2 life.

cards.flavor:
"Survival rule 781: There are always more scute bugs."
—Zurdi, goblin shortcutter
cards.name: Scute Mob
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control five or more lands, put four +1/+1 counters on Scute Mob.

cards.name: Tajuru Archer
cards.text: Whenever Tajuru Archer or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Tajuru Archer deal damage to target creature with flying equal to the number of Allies you control.

cards.flavor: Its territory is defined by wherever it is at the moment.
cards.name: Territorial Baloth
cards.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Territorial Baloth gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.name: Turntimber Basilisk
cards.text:
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target creature block Turntimber Basilisk this turn if able.

cards.flavor:
"Life as we know it dangles on the brink of extinction. We must show the strength they would steal from us."
—The Invokers' Tales
cards.name: Wildheart Invoker
cards.text: {8}: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.

cards.name: Veteran Warleader
cards.text:
Veteran Warleader's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.
Tap another untapped Ally you control: Veteran Warleader gains your choice of first strike, vigilance, or trample until end of turn.

cards.name: Explorer's Scope
cards.text:
Whenever equipped creature attacks, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

cards.flavor: "The shadow travels toward the apex. I predict we will soon see the true measure of darkness."
cards.name: Seer's Sundial
cards.text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.

cards.flavor:
"We suffer uneasy ground, unstable alliances, and unpredictable magic. Something you can truly trust is worth more than a chest of gold."
—Nikou, Joraga bard
cards.name: Stonework Puma

cards.flavor: Every world is an organism, able to grow new lands. Some just do it faster than others.
cards.name: Evolving Wilds
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Graypelt Refuge
cards.text:
Graypelt Refuge enters the battlefield tapped.
When Graypelt Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Stirring Wildwood
cards.text:
Stirring Wildwood enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.
{1}{G}{W}: Until end of turn, Stirring Wildwood becomes a 3/4 green and white Elemental creature with reach. It's still a land.

cards.name: Turntimber Grove
cards.text:
Turntimber Grove enters the battlefield tapped.
When Turntimber Grove enters the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: The Eldrazi hunger without limit and consume without pause.
cards.name: Oblivion Sower
cards.text: When you cast Oblivion Sower, target opponent exiles the top four cards of his or her library, then you may put any number of land cards that player owns from exile onto the battlefield under your control.

cards.name: Artisan of Kozilek
cards.text:
When you cast Artisan of Kozilek, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)

cards.flavor: Your pleas for death shall go unheard.
cards.name: It That Betrays
cards.text:
Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)
Whenever an opponent sacrifices a nontoken permanent, put that card onto the battlefield under your control.

cards.flavor:
"Whatever the Eldrazi's purpose is, it has nothing to do with something so insignificant as us."
—Nirthu, lone missionary
cards.name: Ulamog's Crusher
cards.text:
Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)
Ulamog's Crusher attacks each turn if able.

cards.flavor:
"The brood lineages unfolded across the world, each patterned after one of three progenitors, each a study in mindless consumption."
—The Invokers' Tales
cards.name: Bloodrite Invoker
cards.text: {8}: Target player loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

cards.flavor: Some humans willingly offered up their blood, hoping it would grant the vampire families the strength to stave off the Eldrazi.
cards.name: Bloodthrone Vampire
cards.text: Sacrifice a creature: Bloodthrone Vampire gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: His verdict is always guilty. His sentence is always death.
cards.name: Butcher of Malakir
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Butcher of Malakir or another creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

cards.flavor: The mouth must be pried open before rigor mortis sets in. Otherwise the returning soul can find no ingress.
cards.name: Cadaver Imp
cards.text:
Flying
When Cadaver Imp enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.flavor:
"Others ask why the Eldrazi destroy. I ask why they preserve."
—Ganda, Goma Fada deserter
cards.name: Consume the Meek
cards.text: Destroy each creature with converted mana cost 3 or less. They can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Corpsehatch
cards.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. Put two 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

cards.name: Dominator Drone
cards.text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Ingest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of his or her library.)
When Dominator Drone enters the battlefield, if you control another colorless creature, each opponent loses 2 life.

cards.name: Heartstabber Mosquito
cards.text:
Kicker {2}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B} as you cast this spell.)
Flying
When Heartstabber Mosquito enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target creature.

cards.flavor: All the angel saw was her doom.
cards.name: Induce Despair
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Induce Despair, reveal a creature card from your hand.
Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the revealed card's converted mana cost.

cards.name: Marsh Casualties
cards.text:
Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.)
Creatures target player controls get -1/-1 until end of turn. If Marsh Casualties was kicked, those creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn instead.

cards.name: Pawn of Ulamog
cards.text: Whenever Pawn of Ulamog or another nontoken creature you control dies, you may put a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token onto the battlefield. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

cards.flavor: The dead know lessons the living haven't learned.
cards.name: Read the Bones
cards.text: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You lose 2 life. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.flavor:
"Before I hire new recruits, I test how long they can hold their breath. You'd be surprised how often it comes up."
—Zahr Gada, Halimar expedition leader
cards.name: Smother
cards.text: Destroy target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less. It can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Vampire Nighthawk
cards.text:
Flying
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

cards.flavor: Wordlessly it leads its abhorrent brood.
cards.name: Emrakul's Hatcher
cards.text: When Emrakul's Hatcher enters the battlefield, put three 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens onto the battlefield. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool."

cards.flavor:
"Play no favorites. Everybody dies."
—Sparkmage saying
cards.name: Forked Bolt
cards.text: Forked Bolt deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two target creatures and/or players.

cards.flavor: Just when you thought you'd be safe, in the middle of an open field with no Eldrazi around for miles.
cards.name: Hellion Eruption
cards.text: Sacrifice all creatures you control, then put that many 4/4 red Hellion creature tokens onto the battlefield.

cards.flavor:
"The purpose of existence is simple: everything is fuel for the magmaw."
—Jaji, magmaw worshipper
cards.name: Magmaw
cards.text: {1}, Sacrifice a nonland permanent: Magmaw deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

cards.flavor: Once thrown, twice burned.
cards.name: Torch Slinger
cards.text:
Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you cast this spell.)
When Torch Slinger enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, it deals 2 damage to target creature.

cards.flavor:
"While we delay, they're on the move. They will not wait as we bicker. We are losing this war by moments as our goal slips beyond our reach."
—Gideon Jura
cards.name: Forerunner of Slaughter
cards.text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
{1}: Target colorless creature gains haste until end of turn.

cards.flavor: What is mana but possibility, an idea not yet given form?
cards.name: Mind Stone
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.

cards.flavor: Scholars had puzzled for centuries over the ruins at Tal Terig. Its secrets had always lived within one rune-carved head.
cards.name: Runed Servitor
cards.text: When Runed Servitor dies, each player draws a card.

cards.name: Akoum Refuge
cards.text:
Akoum Refuge enters the battlefield tapped.
When Akoum Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

cards.flavor: Each temple is a door to a horrible future.
cards.name: Eldrazi Temple
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {2} to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast colorless Eldrazi spells or activate abilities of colorless Eldrazi.

cards.name: Rocky Tar Pit
cards.text:
Rocky Tar Pit enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}, Sacrifice Rocky Tar Pit: Search your library for a Swamp or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Eldrazi Spawn
cards.text: Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Eldrazi Spawn
cards.text: Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Eldrazi Spawn
cards.text: Sacrifice this creature: Add {1} to your mana pool.
